nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Defenders of the Republic

The Clone Wars: Defenders of the Republic is a young readers' book written by Rob Valois, based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. It was first published by Grosset & Dunlap on October 7, 2010.
Based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, this novel follows a group of clone troopers as they rise through the ranks from cadets, to rookies, and all the way to elite ARC troopers.
Defenders of the Republic adapted the The Clone Wars episodes Clone Cadets, Rookies, and Arc Troopers.
